original_title: McFly: 10th Anniversary Concert - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
overview: McFly document their recent show stopping 10th anniversary celebrations at London's prestigious Royal Albert Hall. Across four incredible sold-out nights, the band – Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, Dougie Poynter and Harry Judd – performed their greatest hits and exclusive tracks with their trademark showmanship, verve and personality. This film captures the excitement and energy of those shows and also includes their incredible, headline-making collaboration with ex-Busted members James Bourne and Matt Willis.
title: McFly: 10th Anniversary Concert - Live at the Royal Albert Hall
